item.title: Against Athletic Recruiting
item.description: Introduction Given recent discussions of admissions quotas for certain groups at elite universities, I’ve been surprised to see little discussion of athlete admissions and athletic recruiting at schools like Harvard. I’m especially surprised to see so little discussion of this in my Twitter-sphere, which consists of ~0 former recruited athletes as far as I know. So, in this post, I will make the case for eliminating athletic recruiting at “elite” universities.
